hints.content:
The bar for Sparky lines up with $\purpleD{150}$ on the scale.  The bar for Wings lines up with $\redD{210}$ on the scale.  


[[☃ image 1]]

Which dragon blows fire farther than $\purpleD{150\,\text{cm}}$ but less than $\redD{210\,\text{cm}}$?

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Dragon and the vertical axis labeled Fire Blowing Distance in centimeters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sparky, Spike, Flamey, Blaze, and Wings. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows, 0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 210, 240, 270, 300 and 330. The bar line for each dragon shows the following: Sparky’s bar line extends to the 150, Spike’s bar line extends to the 270, Flamey’s bar line extends to the 180, Blaze’s bar line extends to the 300, and Wings’ bar line extends to 210. A violet line is drawn to the right from 150, which reaches to the end of Sparky's bar line. A red line is drawn to the right from 210, which reaches to the end of Wings' bar line. !

A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Dragon and the vertical axis labeled Fire Blowing Distance in centimeters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sparky, Spike, Flamey, Blaze, and Wings. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows, 0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 210, 240, 270, 300 and 330. The bar line for each dragon shows the following: Sparky’s bar line extends to the 150, Spike’s bar line extends to the 270, Flamey’s bar line extends to the 180, Blaze’s bar line extends to the 300, and Wings’ bar line extends to 210. A green line is drawn to the right from 180, which reaches to the end of Flamey's bar line. !

hints.content: $\greenD{\text{Flamey}}$ blows fire farther than Sparky but not as far as Wings.

question.content:
Davi the dragon keeper  measured how far each of his dragons can blow fire.

**Which dragon blows fire farther than Sparky but not as far as Wings?**
[[☃ image 2]]
[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Dragon and the vertical axis labeled Fire Blowing Distance in centimeters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sparky, Spike, Flamey, Blaze, and Wings. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows, 0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 210, 240, 270, 300 and 330. The bar line for each dragon shows the following: Sparky’s bar line extends to the 150, Spike’s bar line extends to the 270, Flamey’s bar line extends to the 180, Blaze’s bar line extends to the 300, and Wings’ bar line extends to 210. !
